Overview.ExamName: Birla Institute of Technology and Science Admission Test (BITSAT)
Overview.Purpose: Admission to B.E., B.Pharm, and M.Sc. programs at BITS Pilani, Goa, Hyderabad, and Dubai campuses

BE_and_MSc.Aggregate: Minimum 75% in PCM, and 60% in each subject

BPharm_and_BE_EnvironmentalSustainabilit.Qualification: 10+2 with Physics, Chemistry, Biology or Mathematics
BPharm_and_BE_EnvironmentalSustainabilit.Aggregate: Minimum 75% in PCB/PCM, and 60% in each subject

AdditionalNotes: Candidates appearing in Class 12 in 2026 are eligible
Board toppers get direct admission without BITSAT

Notes: Candidates can apply for both sessions; best score will be considered
Exam center choices available as per preference

SpecialRules: Candidates can switch between sections freely
Bonus questions available only after answering all 130 regular questions

Syllabus.Base: NCERT Class 11 & 12 syllabus for Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics/Biology

Notes: Cutoffs vary by campus and course
BITS Pilani has the highest cutoff
Board toppers are directly admitted regardless of cutoff

Process: Submit academic marks and preferences post-exam
Merit list and waitlist released in multiple iterations
Confirm seat by paying admission fee and uploading documents
Report physically for final admission verification
Counselling.DirectAdmission: Available for central and state board toppers
